name: aiffamp3
description: The Audio Converter Tool is a Node.js-based utility designed to provide a seamless solution for converting audio files between AIFF (Audio Interchange File Format) and MP3 (MPEG Audio Layer III) formats. This tool allows users to easily convert high-quality AIFF files into space-efficient MP3s and vice versa, making it versatile for various audio processing needs. Whether youâ€™re optimizing audio files for storage, transferring music, or needing compatibility with different media players, this tool simplifies the conversion process while maintaining audio fidelity.
author: Maestro
